DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to expand access to buprenorphine using a mobile health care system among marginalized populations with or at high risk for HIV and observe longitudinal effects of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Cohort of Opiate Dependent Patients on Buprenorphine/Naloxone for Maintenance
DOC.criteria: HIV + At high risk for HIV (IV drug use, commercial sex worker, partner of HIV+) Mental Health (unmanaged or diagnosed mental illness) Benzodiazepine use Opiate use due to pain management issues only (present or past) NonIDU
